attributes.additional_details:
Given that the greatest show on earth is visiting Great Britain this year, We the undersigned are disgusted that such an important contract (for the printing of Olympic tickets) has been let to a foriegn company. Our Great country it seems, is not so great as to be able to provide printed tickets to a specification.
We insist that this Government give priority to British companies to contract for a Great British event, especially in these difficult times in order to provide jobs for British workers in British factories..
